sides.title: "Chopper"
sides.ability: During the Perform Action step, you may perform 1 action, even while stressed. After you perform an action while stressed, suffer 1 [Hit] damage unless you expose 1 of your damage cards.

sides.title: "Zeb" Orrelios
sides.ability: You can perform primary attacks at range 0. Enemy ships at range 0 can perform primary attacks against you.
At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may choose 1 enemy ship at range 0-1. If you do, you gain 1 calculate token unless that ship chooses to gain 1 stress token.

sides.title: 4-LOM
sides.ability: While you perform an attack, after rolling attack dice, you may name a type of green token. If you do, gain 2 ion tokens and, during this attack, the defender cannot spend tokens of the named type.

sides.title: Admiral Sloane
sides.ability: After another friendly ship at range 0-3 defends, if it is destroyed, the attacker gains 2 stress tokens. While a friendly ship at range 0-3 performs an attack against a stressed ship, it may reroll 1 attack die.

sides.title: Agent Kallus
sides.ability: Setup: After placing forces, assign the Hunted condition to 1 enemy ship. While you perform an attack against the ship with the Hunted condition, you may change 1 of your [Focus] results to a [Hit] result.

sides.title: Baze Malbus
sides.ability: While you perform a [Focus] action, you may treat it as red. If you do, gain 1 additional focus token for each enemy ship at range 0-1, to a maximum of 2.

sides.title: Boba Fett
sides.ability: Setup: Start in reserve. At the end of Setup, place yourself at range 0 of an obstacle and beyond range 3 of any enemy ship.

sides.title: C-3PO
sides.ability: Before rolling defense dice, you may spend 1 calculate token to guess aloud a number 1 or higher. If you do and you roll exactly that many [Evade] results, add 1 [Evade] result. After you perform the [Calculate] action, gain 1 calculate token.

sides.title: Cad Bane
sides.ability: After you drop or launch a device, you may perform a red [Boost] action.

sides.title: Captain Phasma
sides.ability: At the end of the Engagement Phase, each enemy ship at range 0-1 that is not stressed gains 1 stress token.

sides.title: Cassian Andor
sides.ability: During the System Phase, you may choose 1 enemy ship at range 1-2 and guess aloud a bearing and speed, then look at that ship's dial. If the chosen ship's bearing and speed match your guess, you may set your dial to another maneuver.

sides.title: Chewbacca
sides.ability: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may spend 2 [Charge] to repair 1 faceup damage card.

sides.title: Chewbacca
sides.ability: At the start of the End Phase, you may spend 1 focus token to repair 1 of your faceup damage cards.

sides.title: Ciena Ree
sides.ability: After you perform a [Coordinate] action, if the ship you coordinated performed a [Barrel Roll] or [Boost] action, it may gain 1 stress token to rotate 90Â°.

sides.title: Cikatro Vizago
sides.ability: During the End Phase, you may choose 2 [Illicit] upgrades equipped to friendly ships at range 0-1. If you do, you may exchange these upgrades. End of Game: Return all [Illicit] upgrades to their original ships.

sides.title: Darth Vader
sides.ability: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may choose 1 ship in your firing arc at range 0-2 and spend 1 [Force]. If you do, that ship suffers 1 [Hit] damage unless it chooses to remove 1 green token.

sides.title: Death Troopers
sides.ability: During the Activation Phase, enemy ships at range 0-1 cannot remove stress tokens.

sides.title: Director Krennic
sides.ability: Setup: Before placing forces, assign the Optimized Prototype condition to another friendly ship.

sides.title: Emperor Palpatine
sides.ability: While another friendly ship defends or performs an attack, you may spend 1 [Force] to modify 1 of its dice as though that ship had spent 1 [Force].

sides.title: Freelance Slicer
sides.ability: While you defend, before attack dice are rolled, you may spend a lock you have on the attacker to roll 1 attack die. If you do, the attacker gains 1 jam token. Then, on a [Hit] or [Critical Hit] result, gain 1 jam token.

sides.title: General Hux
sides.ability: While you perform a white [Coordinate] action, you may treat it as red. If you do, you may coordinate up to 2 additional ships of the same ship type, and each ship you coordinate must perform the same action, treating that action as red.

sides.title: GNK "Gonk" Droid
sides.ability: Setup: Lose 1 [Charge]. Action: Recover 1 [Charge]. Action: Spend 1 [Charge] to recover 1 shield.

sides.title: Grand Inquisitor
sides.ability: After an enemy ship at range 0-2 reveals its dial, you may spend 1 [Force] to perform 1 white action on your action bar, treating that action as red.

sides.title: Grand Moff Tarkin
sides.ability: During the System Phase, you may spend 2 [Charge]. If you do, each friendly ship may acquire a lock on a ship that you have locked.

sides.title: Hera Syndulla
sides.ability: You can execute red maneuvers even while stressed. After you fully execute a red maneuver, if you have 3 or more stress tokens, remove 1 stress token and suffer 1 [Hit] damage.

sides.title: IG-88D
sides.ability: You have the pilot ability of each other friendly ship with the IG-2000 upgrade. After you perform a [Calculate] action, gain 1 calculate token.

sides.title: ISB Slicer
sides.ability: During the End Phase, enemy ships at range 1-2 cannot remove jam tokens.

sides.title: Informant
sides.ability: Setup: After placing forces, choose 1 enemy ship and assign the Listening Device condition to it.

sides.title: Jabba the Hutt
sides.ability: During the End Phase, you may choose 1 friendly ship at range 0-2 and spend 1 [Charge]. If you do, that ship recovers 1 [Charge] on 1 of its equipped [Illicit] upgrades.

sides.title: Jyn Erso
sides.ability: If a friendly ship at range 0-3 would gain a focus token, it may gain 1 evade token instead.

sides.title: Kanan Jarrus
sides.ability: After a friendly ship at range 0-2 fully executes a white maneuver, you may spend 1 [Force] to remove 1 stress token from that ship.

sides.title: Ketsu Onyo
sides.ability: At the start of the End Phase, you may choose 1 enemy ship at range 0-2 in your firing arc. If you do, that ship does not remove its tractor tokens.

sides.title: Kylo Ren
sides.ability: Action: Choose 1 enemy ship at range 1-3. If you do, spend 1 [Force] to assign the I'll Show You the Dark Side condition to that ship.

sides.title: L3-37
sides.ability: Setup: Equip this side faceup. While you defend, you may flip this card. If you do, the attacker must reroll all attack dice.

sides.title: L3-37's Programming
sides.ability: If you are not shielded, decrease the difficulty of your bank ([Bank Left] and [Bank Right]) maneuvers.

sides.title: Lando Calrissian
sides.ability: After you roll dice, you may spend 1 green token to reroll up to 2 of your results.

sides.title: Lando Calrissian
sides.ability: Action: Roll 2 defense dice. For each [Focus] result, gain 1 focus token. For each [Evade] result, gain 1 evade token. If both results are blank, the opposing player chooses focus or evade. You gain 1 token of that type.

sides.title: Latts Razzi
sides.ability: While you defend, if the attacker is stressed, you may remove 1 stress from the attacker to change 1 of your blank/[Focus] results to an [Evade] result.

sides.title: Leia Organa
sides.ability: At the start of the Activation Phase, you may spend 3 [Charge]. During this phase, each friendly ship reduces the difficulty of its red maneuvers.

sides.title: Magva Yarro
sides.ability: After you defend, if the attack hit, you may acquire a lock on the attacker.

sides.title: Maul
sides.ability: After you suffer damage, you may gain 1 stress token to recover 1 [Force]. You can equip "Dark Side" upgrades.

sides.title: Minister Tua
sides.ability: At the start of the Engagement Phase, if you are damaged, you may perform a red [Reinforce] action.

sides.title: Moff Jerjerrod
sides.ability: During the System Phase, you may spend 2 [Charge]. If you do, choose the [1 [Bank Left]], [1 [Straight]], or [1 [Bank Right]] template. Each friendly ship may perform a red [Boost] action using that template.

sides.title: Nien Nunb
sides.ability: Decrease the difficulty of your bank maneuvers ([Bank Left] and [Bank Right]).

sides.title: Novice Technician
sides.ability: At the end of the round, you may roll 1 attack die to repair 1 faceup damage card. Then on a [Hit] result, expose 1 damage card.

sides.title: Perceptive Copilot
sides.ability: After you perform a [Focus] action, gain 1 focus token.

sides.title: Petty Officer Thanisson
sides.ability: During the Activation or Engagement Phase, after an enemy ship in your [Front Arc] at range 0-1 gains a red or orange token, if you are not stressed, you may gain 1 stress token. If you do, that ship gains 1 additional token of the type that it gained.

sides.title: Qi'ra
sides.ability: While you move and perform attacks, you ignore obstacles that you are locking.

sides.title: R2-D2
sides.ability: During the End Phase, if you are damaged and not shielded, you may roll 1 attack die to recover 1 shield. On a [Hit] result, expose 1 of your damage cards.

sides.title: Sabine Wren
sides.ability: Setup: Place 1 ion, 1 jam, 1 stress, and 1 tractor token on this card. After a ship suffers the effect of a friendly bomb, you may remove 1 ion, jam, stress, or tractor token from this card. If you do, that ship gains a matching token.

sides.title: Saw Gerrera
sides.ability: While you perform an attack, you may suffer 1 [Hit] damage to change all of your [Focus] results to [Critical Hit] results.

sides.title: Seasoned Navigator
sides.ability: After you reveal your dial, you may set your dial to another non-red maneuver of the same speed. While you execute that maneuver, increase its difficulty.

sides.title: Seventh Sister
sides.ability: If an enemy ship at range 0-1 would gain a stress token, you may spend 1 [Force] to have it gain 1 jam or tractor token instead.

sides.title: Supreme Leader Snoke
sides.ability: During the System Phase, you may choose any number of enemy ships beyond range 1. If you do, spend that many [Force] to flip each chosen ship's dial faceup.

sides.title: Tactical Officer
sides.text: In the chaos of a starfighter battle, a single order can mean the difference between a victory and a massacre.

sides.title: Tobias Beckett
sides.ability: Setup: After placing forces, you may choose 1 obstacle in the play area. If you do, place it anywhere in the play area beyond range 2 of any board edge or ship and beyond range 1 of other obstacles.

sides.title: Unkar Plutt
sides.ability: After you partially execute a maneuver, you may suffer 1 [Hit] damage to perform 1 white action.

sides.title: Zuckuss
sides.ability: While you perform an attack, if you are not stressed, you may choose 1 defense die and gain 1 stress token. If you do, the defender must reroll that die.

sides.title: C-3PO
sides.ability: While you coordinate, you can choose friendly ships beyond range 2 if they have [Calculate] on their action bar. After you perform the [Calculate] or [Coordinate] action, gain 1 calculate token.

sides.title: Han Solo
sides.ability: After you perform an [Evade] action, gain additional evade tokens equal to the number of enemy ships at range 0-1.

sides.title: Chewbacca
sides.ability: Setup: Lose 1 [Charge]. After a friendly ship at range 0-3 is dealt 1 damage card, recover 1 [Charge]. While you perform an attack, you may spend 2 [Charge] to change 1 [Focus] result to a [Critical Hit] result.

sides.title: Rose Tico
sides.ability: While you defend or perform an attack, you may spend 1 of your results to acquire a lock on the enemy ship.

sides.title: Chancellor Palpatine
sides.ability: Setup: Equip this side faceup. After you defend, if the attacker is at range 0-2, you may spend 1 [Force]. If you do, the attacker gains 1 stress token. During the End Phase, you may flip this card.

sides.title: Darth Sidious
sides.ability: After you perform a purple [Coordinate] action, the ship you coordinated gains 1 stress token. Then, it gains 1 focus token or recovers 1 [Force].

sides.title: Count Dooku
sides.ability: Before a ship at range 0-2 rolls attack or defense dice, if all of your [Force] are active, you may spend 1 [Force] and name a result. If the roll does not contain the named result, the ship must change 1 die to that result.

sides.title: General Grievous
sides.ability: While you defend, after the Neutralize Results step, if there are 2 or more [Hit]/[Critical Hit] results, you may spend 1 [Charge] to cancel 1 [Hit] or [Critical Hit] result. After a friendly ship is destroyed, recover 1 [Charge].

Before you engage, you may choose another friendly ship at range 1-2. You may transfer to that ship 1 token of a type that ship does not have. That ship may transfer 1 token to you of a type you do not have.
sides.title: Amilyn Holdo

sides.ability: Setup: Before placing forces, you may spend 3-5 [Charge]. If you do, choose another friendly ship and assign the It's the Resistance condition to it.
sides.title: GA-97

sides.ability: After you reveal your dial, you may set your dial to a basic maneuver of the next higher speed. While you execute that maneuver, increase its difficulty.
sides.title: Kaydel Connix

sides.ability: After you fully execute a blue maneuver, remove all of your stress tokens.
sides.title: Korr Sella

sides.ability: While you have 2 or fewer stress tokens, you can perform [Reinforce], [Coordinate], and [Jam] actions, even while stressed. While you perform a white [Reinforce], [Coordinate], or [Jam] action, if you are stressed, treat that action as red.
sides.title: Larma D'Acy

sides.ability: After a friendly ship reveals its dial, you may spend 1 [Force]. If you do, the chosen ship reduces the difficulty of that maneuver.
sides.title: Leia Organa

sides.ability: At the end of the Activation Phase, you may choose 1 friendly ship at range 1-2. If you do, transfer 1 calculate token to that ship. If your revealed maneuver is blue, you may transfer 1 focus token instead.
sides.title: PZ-4CO
C-3PO
sides.ability: While you defend, if you are calculating, you may reroll 1 defense die. After you perform a [Calculate] action, gain 1 calculate token.
While an enemy ship in your [Bullseye Arc] performs an attack, if the defender is friendly and at range 0-2, the defender may change 1 blank result to a [Focus] result.
sides.title: Aayla Secura

sides.ability: Setup: Equip this side faceup and place 3 calculate tokens on this card. At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may choose a friendly ship at range 0-3 and remove 1 calculate token from this card to have that ship gain a matching token. Then, if there are no calculate tokens on this card, flip it.
sides.title: Agent Terex
Agent Terex (Cyborg)
sides.ability: During the System Phase, roll 1 attack die. On a [Hit] or [Critical Hit] result, gain 1 calculate token. Otherwise gain 1 jam token. Action: Transfer 1 calculate token or 1 jam token to a ship at range 0-3.
During the System Phase, you may choose a friendly ship at range 0-3. That ship gains 1 calculate and 1 stress token.
sides.title: K-2SO

sides.ability: At the start of the End Phase, if you are reinforced, you may choose 1 friendly ship at range 0 or in your [Left Arc] or [Right Arc] at range 1. That ship removes 1 deplete or strain token, or repairs 1 faceup damage card.
sides.title: Plo Koon

sides.ability: After you coordinate a friendly ship, it may acquire a lock on a ship you are locking, ignoring range restrictions.
sides.title: Toryn Farr
Kit Fisto
sides.ability: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may choose 1 friendly ship at range 0-1 and spend 1 [Force]. If you do, it may perform a red [Evade] action.

sides.title: Yoda
sides.ability: After another friendly ship at range 0-2 fully executes a purple maneuver or performs a purple action, you may spend 1 [Force]. If you do, that ship recovers 1 [Force].

sides.title: "Fives"
sides.ability: After you perform an attack that missed, if the defender's initiative is equal to or greater than your initiative, place 1 evade or focus token on this card. Before you engage, you may remove 1 token from this card to gain 1 matching token.

sides.title: Wolfpack
sides.ability: After a friendly ship at range 0-3 defends, if the attacker is in your firing arc, the defender may gain 1 strain token to acquire a lock on the attacker.

sides.title: Commander Malarus
sides.ability: Setup: Equip this side faceup. While a friendly non-limited ship at range 0-1 performs a primary attack, that ship may reroll 1 blank result. If it does and the attack does not hit, you must flip this card.

sides.title: Commander Malarus (Perfected)
sides.ability: While you perform an attack, if the defender is in your [Bullseye Arc], you must convert all [Focus] results to [Hit] results and gain 1 stress token. Then, if you have 2 or more stress tokens, suffer 1 [Hit] damage.

sides.title: Ghost Company
sides.ability: After you perform a primary attack, if you are focused, you may perform a [Single Turret Arc] attack against a ship you have not attacked this round as a bonus attack.

sides.title: Commander Pyre
sides.ability: Setup: After placing forces, choose an enemy ship. It gains 2 stress tokens. While you defend, if the attacker is stressed, you may reroll 1 defense die.
Action: Choose 2 ships at range 1-3 of you that are friendly to each other. Coordinate one of the chosen ships, then jam the other, ignoring range restrictions.
sides.title: Hondo Ohnaka

sides.ability: While you defend or perform an attack, you may spend your lock on the enemy ship to change 1 of the enemy ship's [Focus] results to a blank result.
sides.title: Jango Fett

sides.ability: Setup: Lose 2 [Charge]. During the System Phase, you may assign 1 of your secret conditions to yourself facedown: "You Should Thank Me" or "You'd Better Mean Business"
sides.title: Zam Wesell
